articles.title: ICC Test Rankings: Rohit Sharma, Ravichandran Ashwin Gain Big After Motera Win - News18
articles.description: Meanwhile Ravichandran Ashwin's fine all-round performance made sure that he moves to number three in bowler's rankings. He went onto take nine wickets in the second Test match in Chepauk and also scored a hundred.
articles.content: Indian opener Rohit Sharma broke into top ten of the latest ICC Test rankings for batsman thanks to his superb century against England in Chennai.  While New Zealand’s Kane Williamson continues to to… [+2071 chars]
